answers.answer: Hi there I live in vancouver B.C. and I have yet to find someone really good .  One endo that is a clinical professor at ubc  I have heard is very good his name is  Graheme wilkins if you google ubc faculty for endo doc's you will find him there.  I will probiably be going to see him next.  I have gone through three so far, and no luck with finding a really good one.  Most people on this forum have gone through 3-6 before finding one!!  Hope this helps.  Oh also Dr marshall Dahl is also a clinical prof at ubc ,I have seen him ,but I do not think he deals with mostly thyroid, I think he does allot of diabetes.LJ39    whatever you do DO NOT go and see a Dr.by the name of barbara priestman she really messed me up horribly with RAI treat for hyperthyroidism.
Graheme Wilkens is close to retirement so is not taking on patients needing long-term care (like me).  Does anyone know a good endo in Vancouver???

question: Does anyone live in Vancouver, BC and know of a good Endo that is very familiar with thyroid issues?  Any help would be appreciated.THanks!Misha
title: Endo w/thyroid experience in Vancouver, BC????
